snippet.title: Auto Fire - Pre-Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the latest from Auto Fire right here:  https://vertigames.itch.io/auto-fire

Auto Fire is a reinterpretation of the great auto combat games of the 1980's.  It combines the dynamic world-generation, player advancement and careful combat planning of roguelikes with the rough, outlaw environments of Mad Max and classic westerns.  Refine your vehicle, take on missions and build a name for yourself in a world where the only way to thrive is to drive.
